title: Gate of Adobe Church
credit_line: Purchase: gift of the Women's Committee and friends of Elisabeth Mellon Sellers in her memory
provenance_text:
The artist, until c. 1952; Edith Gregor Halpert (1900-1970), New York, NY, until October 1970; estate of Edith Gregor Halpert, October 1970-March 1973;  estate sale, Sotheby Parke Bernet, New York, NY, March 14-15, 1973, lot 25 [1]; Kennedy Galleries, New York, NY, 1973-May 1974; purchased by Museum, May 1974.

Notes:
[1]. "Highly Important 19th and 20th Century American Paintings, Drawings, Watercolors and Sculpture from the Estate of the Late Edith Gregor Halpert."  This lot sold on March 15, 1973.

Under review for update by CGK.
